src.db package

Submodules

src.db.DatabaseConnection module

The purpose of this script is to connect with the database

src.db.DatabaseConnection.connect()[source]

Connects to the MongoDB database specified in the MONGO_URI environment variable and returns a reference to the ‘train_reservation_system’ database.

Returns:

A reference to the ‘train_reservation_system’ database.

Return type:

pymongo.database.Database
